question: The total of the ages of Amar, Akbar and Anthony is 80 years. What was the total of their ages three years ago ?
answer_description: Required sum = (80 - 3 x 3) years = (80 - 9) years = 71 years.

question: Two bus tickets from city A to B and three tickets from city A to C cost Rs. 77 but three tickets from city A to B and two tickets from city A to C cost Rs. 73. What are the fares for cities B and C from A ?
answer_description: Let Rs. x be the fare of city B from city A and Rs. y be the fare of city C from city A.Then, 2x + 3y = 77           ...(i)       and3x + 2y = 73           ...(ii)Multiplying (i) by 3 and (ii) by 2 and subtracting, we get: 5y = 85   or   y = 17.Putting y = 17 in (i), we get: x = 13.

question: An institute organised a fete and 1/5 of the girls and 1/8 of the boys participated in the same. What fraction of the total number of students took part in the fete ?

question: A number of friends decided to go on a picnic and planned to spend Rs. 96 on eatables. Four of them, however, did not turn up. As a consequence, the remaining ones had to contribute Rs. 4 each extra. The number of those who attended the picnic was

A, B, C, D and E play a game of cards. A says to B, "If you give me three cards, you will have as many as E has and if I give you three cards, you will have as many as D has." A and B together have 10 cards more than what D and E together have. If B has two cards more than what C has and the total number of cards be 133, how many cards does B have ?
answer_description: Clearly, we have :B-3 = E                                    ...(i)B + 3 = D                                      ...(ii)A+B = D + E+10                    ...(iii)B = C + 2                                      ...(iv)A+B + C + D + E= 133            ...(v)From (i) and (ii), we have : 2 B = D + E  ...(vi)From (iii) and (vi), we have : A = B + 10  ...(vii)Using (iv), (vi) and (vii) in (v), we get:(B + 10) + B + (B - 2) + 2B = 1335B = 125B = 25.
